title: 004 - Daren Streblow - Supplements, Cruise Ships, and Too Much Fruit
description:
In part two of Tim's time with Daren, we learn why potato starch can ruin a friendship, and the ebb and flow of comedy on a cruise ship. Tim analyses what makes comedians tick and how much fruit is too much for a caveman.  Get more of Daren Streblow at: http://darenstreblow.com/ Twitter: @darenstreblow
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Tim Hawkins
itunes:subtitle: Find out why Daren's elbows are sore, and why Tim poops charcoal briquettes.
